text: @realDonaldTrump What is worse than the problem? The economy crashing? So basically you’re saying the economy crashing is worse than Americans dying due to this virus.  Where is the pro life outrage??? 🤯 #CoronavirusPandemic #coronavirus #DonaldTrumpCoronavirus
